questions.question: Considering the overall layout and organization, what is the primary function of this product's packaging?

Observing the visual hierarchy, what is the most dominant textual element on the label?
What is the background color of the information displayed regarding the servings per container?

What is the general texture of the surface on which the nutritional facts are printed?

Considering the image, what is the general shape of the nutritional facts label?
